Title: Raspberry Pi Control Center
Description: A GTK+ based Raspberry Pi Control Center. Made to be simple and fast
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A GTK+ based Raspberry Pi Control Center. Made to be simple and fast

RaspberryPi Control Center - RPICC

This project will help newcomers, with managing and monitoring Rasbperry Pi, using GTK+ made GUI.
Technologies used in project:
  • Linux system calls
  • SFML 2.1
  • C++11

Program features:
  • Monitoring CPU and probably GPU usage.
  • Memory comsumption
  • Monitor VCC of Raspberry Pi
